Title: The 2010 World Expo in Shanghai China -- "Educational Wall Charts Entering Primary and Secondary Schools across the Country" Theme Activity
Designer: PRC Education Ministry (中华人民共和国教育部)Xinhua tongxun she (新华通讯社)
Notes: The poster, titled "The Expo spirit will last forever" (世博精神永驻), shows photographs of various events taking place during the Expo, including the Closing Ceremony on 31 October 2010. It was sponsored by Dongwo Jituan (东沃集团).
Tags: 中国2010年上海世界博览会
